contentrichtext.text: {{Multiple issues|BLP sources = May 2010|orphan = February 2009}} {{Infobox person | name = Zuher al-Tbaiti | image = <!-- just the filename, without the File: or Image: prefix or enclosing [[brackets]] --> | alt = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = <!-- {{Birth date and age|YYYY|MM|DD}} or {{Birth-date and age|Month DD, YYYY}} --> | birth_place = | death_date = <!-- {{Death date and age|YYYY|MM|DD|YYYY|MM|DD}} or {{Death-date and age|Month DD, YYYY|Month DD, YYYY}} (death date then birth date) --> | death_place = | nationality = [[Saudi Arabia]]n | other_names = | known_for = | occupation = Terrorist }} '''Zuher al-Tbaiti''' ({{lang-ar|زهير التبايتي}}) was arrested in [[Morocco]] in May 2002 for involvement in alleged plot to bomb [[United States|US]] and [[United Kingdom|British]] vessels transiting the [[Strait of Gibraltar]]. ==External links== *[http://www.time.com/time/world/article/0,8599,262913,00.html?internalid=ACA Inside an al-Qaeda Bust] *[http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?res=9C01E7D81239F932A15755C0A9629C8B63&pagewanted=8 THE REACH OF WAR; U.S. Said to Overstate Value Of Guantánamo Detainees] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Tbaiti, Zuher | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Saudi Arabian terrorist | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Tbaiti, Zuher}} [[Category:Saudi Arabian al-Qaeda members]] [[Category:Living people]]
